title: Ham and wild rice pastries
ingredients: ['5 sheets filo pastry, 30 x 50 cm (12 x 20 in) each, about 150 g (5½ oz) in total', '30 g (1 oz) butter, melted', '2 tsp poppy seeds', 'Filling', '100 g (3½ oz) mixed basmati and wild rice', '300 ml (10 fl oz) chicken stock', '1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '1 red onion, finely chopped', '100 g (3½ oz) shiitake mushrooms, sliced', '100 g (3½ oz) chestnut mushrooms, sliced', '2 small courgettes, diced', '140 g (5 oz) Black Forest ham, trimmed of fat and snipped into strips', '2 tsp chopped fresh tarragon (optional)', 'salt and pepper']
